excerpt: Curious to know the Disney Plus schedule from April 14 to April 20, 2025? Here is a list of all the movies and TV shows being added.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Disney Plus’ new TV and movie release schedule for April 14 – April 20, 2025, includes Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again season finale, Big City Greens Season 4, Light & Magic Season 2, Doctor Who Season 2’s second episode, and many more. On April 15, the Daredevil: Born Again season finale drops on Disney Plus. The previous episode witnessed Matt Murdock finding out the real culprit of Foggy Nelson’s murder. Things take a shocking turn when he ends up taking a bullet for Wilson Fisk after Bullseye attempts to murder him. Further, Big City Greens Season 4 will be available on the streaming platform this week. The sitcom series chronicles the lives of Cricket Green and his family in the big city. However, the new city brings new troubles and adventures for every character. Also coming out on Disney Plus is Light & Magic Season 2’s premiere episode. The documentary series showcases filmmaker Lawrence Kasdan exploring the extraordinary features of Industrial Light & Magic, Lucasfilm’s special effects department. Whether it is the visual effects or animation, every aspect intends to leave viewers surprised. Further, the second episode of Doctor Who Season 2 also releases on Disney Plus this week. The new season follows the Doctor attempting to bring Belinda back to planet Earth. However, their journey ends up getting interrupted by a mysterious force, leading to interesting twists and turns. New Disney Plus releases for April 14 – April 20 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 14 – April 20, 2025. April 15 Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Season Finale at 6 pm PT April 16 Big City Greens (S4, 7 episodes) SuperKitties (S2, 3 episodes) April 18 Light & Magic (Season 2) – Premiere April 19 Doctor Who (Season 2) – Episode 2 For more Disney Plus content, check out an update on the Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 2. Also, here is what’s exciting about the A Goofy Movie’s 30th anniversary.
html:
Disney Plus’ new TV and movie release schedule for April 14 – April 20, 2025, includes Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again season finale, Big City Greens Season 4, Light & Magic Season 2, Doctor Who Season 2’s second episode, and many more.

On April 15, the Daredevil: Born Again season finale drops on Disney Plus. The previous episode witnessed Matt Murdock finding out the real culprit of Foggy Nelson’s murder. Things take a shocking turn when he ends up taking a bullet for Wilson Fisk after Bullseye attempts to murder him.

Further, Big City Greens Season 4 will be available on the streaming platform this week. The sitcom series chronicles the lives of Cricket Green and his family in the big city. However, the new city brings new troubles and adventures for every character.

Also coming out on Disney Plus is Light & Magic Season 2’s premiere episode. The documentary series showcases filmmaker Lawrence Kasdan exploring the extraordinary features of Industrial Light & Magic, Lucasfilm’s special effects department. Whether it is the visual effects or animation, every aspect intends to leave viewers surprised.

Further, the second episode of Doctor Who Season 2 also releases on Disney Plus this week. The new season follows the Doctor attempting to bring Belinda back to planet Earth. However, their journey ends up getting interrupted by a mysterious force, leading to interesting twists and turns.

New Disney Plus releases for April 14 – April 20 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 14 – April 20, 2025.

April 15

  • Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Season Finale at 6 pm PT

April 16

  • Big City Greens (S4, 7 episodes)
  • SuperKitties (S2, 3 episodes)

April 18

  • Light & Magic (Season 2) – Premiere

April 19

  • Doctor Who (Season 2) – Episode 2

For more Disney Plus content, check out an update on the Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 2. Also, here is what’s exciting about the A Goofy Movie’s 30th anniversary.
